DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred thirty-seven healthy early post-menopausal woman ( age 53 ± 3 ; time since last menses 33 ± 15 month ) consume isoflavone-enriched food provide mean daily intake 110 mg isoflavone aglycones control product 1 yr whilst continue habitual diet lifestyle . Outcome measure include bone mineral density lumbar spine total body , marker bone formation bone resorption , hormone , isoflavones plasma urine , safety parameter report adverse event .
